item.title: Interdiciplinary Project
item.description:
NLP Engineer

Fast AI Movies
Munich, Germany
March 2024 – October 2024

At Fast AI Movies, I worked on enhancing AI-driven educational tools by fine-tuning large language models (LLMs) and improving pipeline efficiency.

Key contributions:

  • Fine-tuned LLMs for text generation tasks tailored to educational content.
  • Engineered advanced prompting strategies and data collation pipelines to boost model performance and reliability.
  • Developed a modular Python framework to streamline LLM workflows — from training and evaluation to deployment — accelerating experimentation and production readiness.

Working Student

Brainlab AG
Munich, Germany
November 2023 – February 2025

As a working student at Brainlab AG, I supported the development of customer-facing analytics tools in the healthcare technology domain.

Key contributions:

  • Designed and developed interactive data analysis dashboards using Python Dash.
  • Performed exploratory data analysis and implemented models using scikit-learn to extract actionable insights from clinical data.
  • Contributed to improving the usability and interpretability of visual analytics for medical professionals.

Software Engineer

Tradeware Technology
Istanbul, Turkey
August 2022 – October 2023

At Tradeware Technology, I was part of a team developing high-performance trading systems for financial markets.

Key responsibilities and contributions:

  • Designed and developed high-frequency, multi-threaded trading platforms using C++, focusing on low-latency and real-time performance.
  • Implemented and integrated market communication protocols such as FIX, OUCH, and ITCH.
  • Optimized systems for performance and reliability on Linux, using bash scripting for deployment and automation tasks.
  • Worked on memory-efficient data structures and latency-critical code paths tailored for stock market environments.

item.title: Internship
item.description:
Data Scientist

Reengen
Istanbul, Turkey
May 2022 – July 2022

During my internship at Reengen, an energy analytics company, I worked on processing and analyzing large-scale electrical energy consumption data.

Key contributions:

  • Performed data preprocessing and feature engineering on smart meter time-series data.
  • Applied statistical methods and machine learning models for time series forecasting.
  • Contributed to internal tools for detecting anomalies and optimizing energy usage patterns.

item.title: Internship
item.description:
Embedded Software Developer

TÜBİTAK SAGE
Ankara, Turkey
July 2021 – September 2021

As an embedded software intern at TÜBİTAK SAGE, I contributed to the development of internal tools and communication modules for defense systems.

Key contributions:

  • Developed desktop tools using C++ and the Qt framework.
  • Implemented and tested custom file transfer protocols between systems.
  • Gained hands-on experience in low-level software development and communication between embedded systems.

item.title: Internship
item.description:
Undergraduate Research Fellow

Artificial Intelligence and Intelligent Systems (AI2S) Laboratory
Istanbul Technical University, Istanbul, Turkey
September 2020 – July 2021

I worked as an undergraduate research fellow funded by the Scientific and Technological Research Council of Turkey (TÜBİTAK).

My research focused on:

  • Developing and improving vision-based lane detection algorithms using Python, OpenCV, and classical computer vision techniques.
  • Implementing and testing various controller structures for lateral and longitudinal control of the autonomous vehicle.
  • Working within the ROS (Robot Operating System) framework for modular communication and simulation.

This experience helped me build strong foundations in robotics, control systems, and perception for autonomous driving.
